snippet.title: Asteroid Invaders  -  Teaser
snippet.description:
Teaser video for our soon to be launched Indie Game Asteroid Invaders. A shoot'em up game inspired by the 80's classics like Asteroids and Space Invaders.   For more information and to pre order visit our site at www.asteroidinvaders.com 

So if you love Centipede, Pacman, Ms Pacman, Donkey King, Qbert and other 80s and 90s video games you will love Asteroid Invades
